result.title: Codeforces Calendar
result.content:
Hello, everybody! I've created and shared a public Google Calendar that holds dates of Codeforces rounds.
I'll do my best to keep it up-to-date at all times.

Codeforces Google Calendar

There's a button in the bottom right corner that allows you to see this calendar in your google.com/calendar without any further manual updates.

If you're not using Google Calendar you can view/follow/import this calendar as iCal or XML.

And note that with Google Calendar you can set SMS and e-mail notifications, in order to never miss a Codeforces round. Not only can you do this for a single event, but I also recommend you to go to the Settings menu and set automatic notifications for all events of this calendar.
